root.name: Space Dogs Squadron
root.description: You play as Zoey, the leader of a ragtag group of canines that are all that remains of Zephyr Squad. Hell-bent on avenging the deaths of their comrades, Zoey and her team set out to destroy General Noodles and his fleets of nefarious cats that litter the known Universe and beyond. It's up to you to prove to everyone that you are, in fact, a GOOD DOG.
